item.title: The Day After
item.description: Last week I attended a meeting at Yale and had planned to spend the weekend with Matt and Alex in New York, flying back on Monday (the 3rd).

item.title: Modern Wilde
item.description: Cat and Girl is always good, but this one is absolutely amazing.

item.title: The Gym
item.description: I’ve taken up running over the past month and a half.
